author: civanch
body:
#### PR description:
In order to perform final set of tests of the new version of Geant4 a set of modifications for CMS custom Physics Lists is applied:
  1) FTFP_BERT_EMM - the default is unchanged
  2) FTFP_BERT_EML - use default EM physics configuration and custom part of hadron inelastic with possibility to configure different transition region between the Bertini cascade and the FTFP string model
  3) FTFP_BERT_EMY, FTFP_BERT_EMZ, and QBBC are unchanged, only debug printout is modified
  4) g4Sim_Hits_cfi.py - two extra parameters are added.

title: Physics List updates for future migration to Geant4 10.6
